select p.id,p.name,p.uri,p.pid,p.func_order as funcOrder,p.description from ot_permission p,ot_user u,ot_role r,ot_user_role ur,ot_role_permission rp where u.id=#{user_id} and u.id=ur.user_id and ur.role_id=r.id and r.id=rp.role_id and p.id=rp.permission_id
